Electric Picnic 2008

03 September 2008

Electric Picnic was *amazing*. We saw some great bands, had great food and the camping was fun too.

All the photos from the weekend are up on Flickr. Peruse at will.

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in New York. Find out more about Paul's work or get in touch.
